name: Junah
biography: Junah is a New York City‑based producer known for blending soulful melodies with modern hip‑hop rhythms. Drawing inspiration from jazz, R&B and electronic music, his compositions fuse rich instrumentation with crisp drum programming to create immersive soundscapes. Junah’s beats have been featured by upcoming artists across the East Coast, and he continues to refine his craft by experimenting with new textures and collaborations.
